titleStmt.title: An epithrene: or Voice of vveeping bewailing the want of vveeping. A meditation.
titleStmt.author: Lesly, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A[ugustine] M[athewes] for Humphrey Robinson and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the three Pidgeons,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
